channel.title: Exp questions
channel.description: first of all how do you edit the rate that exp is given to you and second of all i changed my lvl cap to 1000 and the combat level when from 126 to 252 is it blocking a 1 or is there a computing error?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-08-2008, 01:52:10[/size][hr]ok i ran 2 clients and duel logged and its showing from my second client that my character is 252 so i kno that it must be a computing error or a cap was set in some code anyway if i wait a while it drops my exp of my combat skills from 537,000,000 exp to 200,000,000 which is lvl 126 if any1 can help plz do

item.title: Exp questions
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

first of all how do you edit the rate that exp is given to you
and second of all i changed my lvl cap to 1000 and the combat level when from 126 to 252
is it blocking a 1 or is there a computing error?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-08-2008, 01:52:10[/size][hr]ok i ran 2 clients and duel logged and its showing from my second client that my character is 252 so i kno that it must be a computing error or a cap was set in some code anyway if i wait a while it drops my exp of my combat skills from 537,000,000 exp to 200,000,000 which is lvl 126 if any1 can help plz do
